sentence.Network_en: The result might inject more sense into future bargaining.
sentence.Network_cn: 其结果可能为未来的谈判注入更多的理性。

sentence.Network_en: She kept trying to inject a little fun into their relationship.
sentence.Network_cn: 她一直在设法为他们的关系增添一些情趣。

sentence.Network_en: We hope to inject new life into our work.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们希望给我们的工作注入新的活力.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语常见词根前缀后缀大全 ... incomplete 不完全的 inject 注射，注入 inrush 涌入.
民航英语词汇 ... SPOUT 喷射 INJECT 喷射 CROSS FEED VALVE 交输供油活门.
《I love you》之I--Inject(投入),k_chule的网易博客,我哭得像小孩,以为你还会再回来,... 投入爱情里,我们就要懂得为爱付出,因为爱情并不是不劳而获的,有付.
2012英语专业八级词汇表_新东方网 ... initiative a. 创始的 n.第一步 inject vt. 注射;注满;喷射 injunction n. 命令，强制令.

list.abs: 自考英语二词汇表 - 豆丁网 ... debate vt./n. 争论，辩论 injection n. 注射；注射剂，针剂 criterion n. 标准，准则.
高中英语选修6单词表 - 豆丁网 ... inject vt. 注射 △ injection n. 注射；注射剂 needle n. 针；（注射器的）针头 △.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent. (in the sense 'throw or cast on something'): from Latin inject- 'thrown in', from the verb inicere, from in- 'into' + jacere 'throw'

entry.def: To inject someone with a substance such as a medicine means to put it into their body using a device with a needle called a syringe.

example.ex: His son was injected with strong drugs...
example.tran: 他儿子被注射了烈性麻醉药。

example.ex: The technique consists of injecting healthy cells into the weakened muscles...
example.tran: 该技术是把健康细胞注射到衰弱的肌肉里面。

entry.def: If you inject a new, exciting, or interesting quality into a situation, you add it.

example.ex: She kept trying to inject a little fun into their relationship...
example.tran: 她一直在设法为他们的关系增添一些情趣。

example.ex: The result might inject more sense into future bargaining.
example.tran: 其结果可能为未来的谈判注入更多的理性。

entry.def: If you inject money or resources into a business or organization, you provide more money or resources for it.

example.ex: He has injected £5.6 billion into the health service.
example.tran: 他已经为公共医疗卫生服务投入了 56 亿英镑。

sentences.sentence: "We injected the glucose into the patient's vein"

means.word_mean: 2. to introduce (a new aspect or element);

sentences.sentence: "He injected new life into the performance"

means.word_mean: 3. force or drive (a fluid or gas) into by piercing;

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Inject water into the first one and extract useful energy.

stems_affixes.word_buile: ab离开+ject抛→抛掉→可怜的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 形容词的,用作形容词的
stems_affixes.word_buile: ad增加+ject投掷,扔+ive……的→扔上去的,附加的
deject[v.使沮丧, 使灰心]+ed表形容词→adj.沮丧的,失望的
object[n.物体;客体,对象;目标;宾语 v.[to]反对]+ive……的→客观的[词性变化:作名词,表示"目标,目的"]
sub在下面+ject投掷,扔→扔下去→服从的,扔下去大家讨论的主题
ad增加+ject投掷,扔+ive……的→扔上去的,附加的
eject[v.投出,掷出]+ion表名词→n.喷出, 排出物
inter在……中间+ject投掷,扔+ion表名词→在句子中间扔出的字→感叹词

stems_affixes.value_cn: 物体;客体,对象;目标;宾语
stems_affixes.word_buile: ob逆,反+ject投掷,扔→反着扔→反对→引申为扔向目标

stems_affixes.value_cn: [to]反对,异议,不喜欢,反对的理由
stems_affixes.word_buile: object反对+ion表名词→n.[to]反对,异议,不喜欢,反对的理由
object[n.物体;客体,对象;目标;宾语 v.[to]反对]+ive……的→客观的[词性变化:作名词,表示"目标,目的"]
pro向前+ject扔→扔向前面→投射;引申为工程项目
project[v.投射出;n.工程项目]+ile物体→向前扔的物体
project[v.投射出;n.工程项目]+ion表名词→n.射出,投射;计划
re回+ject扔回来→拒绝
reject[v.拒绝,抵制,丢弃,排斥,退掉 n.落选者]+ion表名词→n.退回,拒绝
sub在下面+ject投掷,扔→扔下去→服从的,扔下去大家讨论的主题
subject[n.主题;学科 adj.隶属的;易遭..的 v.使隶属]+ion表名词→n.征服
subject主观+ivity表名词→n.主观性, 主观
tra穿+ject投掷,扔+ory范围→扔出去穿过的范围→弹道轨道
con共同+ject投掷,扔+ure表名词→大家一起扔[思想]→推测
de向下+ject投掷,扔→情绪向下扔→沮丧
e出+ject掷→掷出
in进入+ject投掷,扔→扔进去→注射
ob逆,反+ject投掷,扔→反着扔→反对→引申为扔向目标
pro向前+ject扔→扔向前面→投射;引申为工程项目

sentences.en: The doctor has injected him under the skin.
sentences.cn: 医生已给他皮下注射了一针。

sentences.en: We hope to inject interest into our party.
sentences.cn: 我们希望我们的聚会更有趣味。

jushi.english: The doctor has injected him under the skin.
jushi.chinese: 医生已给他打了皮下针。

jushi.english: This drug can't be swallowed; it has to be injected.
jushi.chinese: 这药不能吞服,只能注射。

jushi.english: “Do you know the cause of the failure?”“No,” Mr. Smith injected,“What about the carelessness?”
jushi.chinese: “你知道失败的原因吗?”“不知道。是否由于粗心的缘故?”史密斯先生顺势问道。
